article.class: fl-post post-4728 page type-page status-publish hentry

td.p: Pro-Vision Academy offers academic classes for grades 3-12 that challenge students and provide opportunities for short- and long-term success.

Pro-Vision’s housing program is focused on revitalizing the Pro-Vision community within the Sunnyside area. It is our belief that it will be established and replicated throughout other low-income, underserved neighborhoods that have experienced significant disinvestment.

Pro-Vision is not only an Open-Enrollment Texas State Charter Middle and High School, but is also an Organization that provides key programming that helps the youth in the Sunnyside Community and surrounding areas in Houston.

The Pro-Vision McNair Urban Farm is an important vehicle for teaching critical aspects of business and modern agriculture and creating meaningful connections between the farm, local growers, and communities.

img.title: Education
img.p: Pro-Vision Academy offers academic classes for grades 3-12 that challenge students and provide opportunities for short- and long-term success.

img.title: home
img.p: Pro-Vision’s housing program is focused on revitalizing the Pro-Vision community within the Sunnyside area. It is our belief that it will be established and replicated throughout other low-income, underserved neighborhoods that have experienced significant disinvestment.

img.title: Hand
img.p: Pro-Vision is not only an Open-Enrollment Texas State Charter Middle and High School, but is also an Organization that provides key programming that helps the youth in the Sunnyside Community and surrounding areas in Houston.

img.title: food
img.p: The Pro-Vision Urban Farm is an important vehicle for teaching critical aspects of business and modern agriculture and creating meaningful connections between the farm, local growers, and communities
